LanguageData.SiegeMechanoid.arrivalTextEnemy:
Rather than attack directly, the mechanoids are setting up a mech cluster near the colony. You must attack it to finally remove the threat.

The cluster will be initially dormant, so you can take time to decide how to attack it.

It may remain dormant until disturbed, or it may have a timer or proximity activators.

Even dormant mech clusters aren't harmless. A dormant cluster may assemble mechanoid attackers from time to time, or have some broader negative effect that must be dealt with eventually.
LanguageData.ImmediateAttackBreaching.arrivalTextEnem: They are attacking immediately.\n\nThese raiders intend to breach your walls. They'll determine their own path into your colony and destroy anything in their way.
